mapper.select: SELECT p.patientno "patientNO",s.serviceno "serviceNo", p.patientname "patientName", p.patientaddr "patientAddr", p.patientsex "patientSex",p.patientbirth "patientBirth", p.patientfamilytel "patientFamilyTel", p.patientdisease "patientDisease", p.patientgrade "patientGrade", p.patientblood "patientBlood", p.patientmedication "patientMedication",p.patientunique "patientUnique", p.patienttel "patientTel",rn.helpername "helperName", s.servicestarttime "serviceStartTime",s.serviceendtime "serviceEndTime", s.servicedemand "serviceDemand", s.serviceprice "servicePrice", s.helperprice "helperPrice", s.serviceprice * (1-c.codename) FROM patient p,serviceapply s, code c, helper h, review r, (SELECT h.helpername FROM review r, helper h WHERE r.reviewwriter = h.helperno) rn WHERE h.helperno = s.helperno and h.helperno = #{helperNo} and s.patientno = p.patientno and h.commissiongrade = c.codeid and s.serviceno = #{serviceNo}
